title: Human Resources Manager Interview
Application Type: I applied online. The process took 5 days. I interviewed at Sisters of St. Joseph (Raleigh, NC) in Aug 2015
Interview Descriptions:
I sent my resume, a couple of days after the office manager call me, we set an phone interview.  I went very well. All the question were relevant to the position, my experience and skills. The person , (Connie) told me, based on my experience I could be the person the company needed for the HR Manager position. She asked me to coming to the office in Noth Raleigh to meet with the owner, Miss Kathy.
I went in to the office,I met Miss Kathy an Miss Connie(the person on the phone).
Interview Questions:
1) Comments on my outfit. 
2) My name is not from USA, where is it from, what country was I born in?.
3) My last name, did I marry an american to get that last name?
4) What salary was I looking for?
